visualisation package

Submodules

visualisation.visualisation module

visualisation.py

Defines the Visualiser class which inherits from the Simulation class. Uses matplotlib to render the simulation.

Timothy Chew 1/8/25

class visualisation.visualisation.Visualiser(xray_bath: Xray, gamma_pulse: Gamma, bath_vis=False)[source]

Bases: Simulation

Visualiser for simulation Child of Simulation

Attributes:
bath_vis (bool):

  • True to focus on X-ray pulse

  • False to focus on gamma pulse

Affects the limits of the plot (for values used in the 2018 experiment)

Methods:

plot: Plots out the simulation with a time step slider

get_bath_vis() → bool[source]

Access method for bath visualiser boolean

Returns:

bool: bath visualiser boolean

plot()[source]

Plots out the simulation with a time step slider using matplotlib
